name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a frying pan, cook pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Add garlic to the pancetta and cook for 1 minute.
Drain the spaghetti and add to the pan, removing from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding reserved pasta water to create a sauce.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and garam masala for at least 1 hour.
In a pan, sauté onion and garlic until golden.
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in canned tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add cream and season with salt.
Garnish with coriander before serving.

name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook sushi rice and mix with rice vinegar.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo mat.
Spread sushi rice over nori, leaving a 1-inch border.
Place fish and cucumber in the center.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce.

name: Tacos al Pastor
steps: Marinate pork with adobo sauce for 1 hour.
Grill the pork until cooked through.
Warm corn tortillas on the grill.
Assemble tacos with pork, pineapple, onion, and cilantro.
Serve with lime wedges.

name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: In a skillet, brown the beef slices and remove from pan.
Sauté onion and mushrooms until soft.
Sprinkle flour over the mixture and stir.
Slowly add beef broth and bring to a simmer.
Return beef to the pan and stir in sour cream.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve over egg noodles.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Layer tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Tuck basil leaves between layers.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

name: Biryani
steps: In a pot, sauté onions until golden.
Add meat and cook until browned.
Stir in tomatoes and biryani spice mix.
Add rice and broth, bring to a boil, then simmer covered until rice is cooked.
Garnish with fresh mint and coriander before serving.

name: Moussaka
steps: Salt eggplant slices and let sit for 30 minutes, then rinse.
In a pan, sauté onion and ground beef until browned.
Add tomatoes and tomato paste, simmer for 20 minutes.
Layer eggplant and meat mixture in a baking dish, top with bechamel sauce.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 45 minutes.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter, brown sugar, and white sugar.
Beat in the egg and vanilla extract.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together milk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Pour batter onto a hot griddle and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown. Serve with maple syrup.
